idk if this is the best place to share this, but I wrote a thing:

Proposal: an HTML element for spoilers

content.body: it'd need a corresponding ARIA role too; find-in-page and assistive technologies would need to treat it differently, and it's not necessarily a disclosure widget bc of the optional-ness of the summary button.
